Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A.5782/S.176, which would establish the New York Public Banking Act, and A.3309/S.3016, which would establish an Empire State Public Bank.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish the New York Public Banking Act, which would establish an Empire State Public Bank. (A.5782/S.176 and A.3309/S.3016)
